import React, { useState } from 'react' import productview from './productview.css' import Header from './Header' import Footer from './Footer' import chart from '../chart.jpg' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function ProductView() { const navigate = useNavigate const list = localStorage.getItem('productdata') const [data, setData] = useState(JSON.parse(list)) const[ sizecolor, setSizecolor] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor1, setSizecolor1] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor2, setSizecolor2] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor3, setSizecolor3] = useState(false) const[ sizecolor4, setSizecolor4] = useState(false) const[showChart, setShowChart] = useState(false) return (


setSizecolor(true)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(false)} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",background:sizecolor?"linear-gradient(45deg,#BE9130, #e4c65b, #BE9130)":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(true)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(false)} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",background:sizecolor1?"linear-gradient(45deg,#BE9130, #e4c65b, #BE9130)":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(true)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(false)} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",background:sizecolor2?"linear-gradient(45deg,#BE9130, #e4c65b, #BE9130)":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(true)&setSizecolor4(false)} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",background:sizecolor3?"linear-gradient(45deg,#BE9130, #e4c65b, #BE9130)":null}}>
setSizecolor(false)&setSizecolor1(false)&setSizecolor2(false)&setSizecolor3(false)&setSizecolor4(true)} style={{width:"10%", height:"6vh", border:"1px solid black", display:"flex", justifyContent:"center", alignItems:"center",background:sizecolor4?"linear-gradient(45deg,#BE9130, #e4c65b, #BE9130)":null}}>
